Mods.Name: Alive
Mods.Instructions: Alive is a mod by baarilliant.ai that adds AI-powered villagers to Minecraft. It allows villagers to have unique personalities, backstories, and behaviors.

Mods.Name: Fabric
Mods.Instructions: Fabric is a lightweight, modular modding toolchain for Minecraft. It provides the foundation for many mods, including Alive.

Mods.Name: Minecraft
Mods.Instructions: Minecraft is a sandbox game developed by Mojang Studios where players can build and explore virtual worlds made up of blocks.
